website_summaries.verdict: This model boasts a sturdy steel frame with a high load capacity, and stands out for the ability to adjust its height remotely.
pros: 2 cable grommets and a cable management tray to help stay organized
Steel frame adjusts anywhere from 28 inches to 48.5 inches so users can choose the right height for their individual comfort
Adjustment is controlled by a dual motor system, and motors are operated remotely through iOS or Android
cons: Oil from the leg motors may leak slightly during assembly

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the ApexDesk Flex Pro!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this desk on my studio and it becomes very easy to work while standing or sitting down. I love the fact that I ca set up the heights that I use the most! We customized the table part by buying the wood at homedepot, it is also cheaper than buying it already done. Tip: we used dry erase whiteboard to write on it too!
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: This is my second day with this and I am very happy with how solid this desk is
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bluetooth controlled 66" base. This is my second day with this and I am very happy with how solid this desk is. Better than I imagined even after watching the Youtube reviews; I love it! I've got a 34" monitor and a heavier table top. Even fully extended, there is no wobble. The ONLY thing I am really wanting that this doesn't have is the ability to control the height with Alexa/Smartthings/or IFTTT. I'm hoping someone is working on this. "Alexa, set desk to Standing" Edit: ApexDesk responded to an email I sent to them and they say they are already working on this. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kerbob

customer_reviews.title: package is so bad and the original and replacement table tops are both ...
customer_reviews.text: Remember to check if there are any damages all components especially for table top prior to assemble. Bought the 66 inch x 30 inch size. package is so bad and the original and replacement table tops are both damaged. The edges of table top surface are damaged with wood exposed. Don't buy this size. It is too big and heavy for their package. The screws have low quality too , cannot take 2 of them out when dissemble it. Just wasted 4 hours for assembling and dissembling. Attached the damaged table top surfaces for 2 tables.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND, 1L and loving this desk!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave reviews, let alone add photos but I love this desk!! I'm 5'9 (roughly 180cm) and a first year law student and I wanted a sit/stand desk for studying. This desk is the best purchase I could have made for school. It's the perfect size for me and matches my height perfectly. I have PLENTY of room. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great and good looking table!
customer_reviews.text: One of the leg motors popped out while taking out the parts from the box, and it has red oily substance on it that can stain your carpet. Besides that mishap the table was very easy to assemble, and I wish the controller is a bit more responsive. You have to hold the button for a second for the motor to bring the table up or down. Aesthetically the table is very good looking, thankfully due to the handling and boxing during the shipping process. The table is wide enough for a 27 inch and a 24 inch monitor; although technically you can get a monitor mount and get a triple monitor setup.
customer_reviews.author: hawxegen

customer_reviews.title: Still great after a year of daily use!
customer_reviews.text: 1. I've had the legs for about 1 year now and the desk is still fantastic. Best office purchase I've made! 2. I wanted the wider Applewood top that Apex desks (the leg mfr.) sells so I purchased that directly from Apex. 3. Fantastic customer service, great product - I waited to write my review to have some time for real experience. 4. I use this desk every day. It is very stable at all heights. 5. Speed is very good - it goes from a little over 47 inches tall to 28 inches in about 26 seconds (at highest speed setting). About the same going up.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Combs

customer_reviews.title: Waiting on new controller
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of having the choice to sit or stand. I outfitted this stand with a piece of 60x30, 3/4" red oak (stained and two grommets installed). I wondered if the wood screws included were too long and they work well. I have three monitors on a mount and the movement is/was smooth. Unfortunately, the controller became defective after two days. It elevates .2 inches per click but I'm able to control it with my phone until I receive a new controller. Customer support was surprisingly responsive (I e-mailed them on Christmas). They state they'll send a new controller.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: I love it now, but it wasn't good at first...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I love how it works with my phone, I love standing all day instead of sitting. BUT..... This is the second one. The first one they sent me not only had horrible damage to the table, but the motor did not work - the table would not go up or down. I complained, they sent me a new motor and a new desk top, both are perfect. So despite the initial damage, I'm still giving it 5 starts because the company made it all right.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn M Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy desk and works well - and looks good. The operation is pretty quiet and seamless when adjusting the height. Also an additional note - I had to move the desk and lost the power cord in the process. I couldn't find a replacement online and I contacted CS and they sent out a cord free of charge and very friendly about it. So great CS from ApexDesk in addition to a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 desk base the boxes were beat-up. When I opened the cheap thin under protected packaging for a heavy weight product. One of each desk base leg was bent. One of each the motor were out of place in both bases, I wanted use these items for my workspace to be nice and neat. However, couldn't do it I had to return them. I'm unsure I'll re-order maybe it was a fluke if I do I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: TheRightPriceShopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it. The grommets wires are too short for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The grommets wires are too short for the desk's higher postioning and other cords dangled, so I used Command picture hanging tape to secure a circuit breaker strip upside-down under the desktop and the back covers to hold the redundant wires and managed to eliminate any dangling wire which adds greatly to the effect of the clean, sterile look.
customer_reviews.author: cleonard007

customer_reviews.title: Decent table top that needs better packaging
customer_reviews.text: The table top looks nice and was easily to drill through for screwing things in. Unfortunately mine came with a dented corner which is a problem I've seen in other reviews. Beware, the underside of the table has about a 1-inch slant from the edge of the table on every side so some desk clamps will not fit if their clamp doesn't go deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Z

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Bluebooth standing desk
customer_reviews.text: Excellent: · They offer two tops. Both look good but similar. Couldn’t decide which one to go. They promptly sent me color chips for both to help me make the decision after I contacted them. Good: · Heavy, very sturdy and not wobbly. · Memory control panel works well. Bluetooth is cool and a plus. · Quiet and robust lifting · Top-notch craftsmanship. Tabletop is drop-dead beautiful and looks expensive. Love the recessed edges of the top. Bad: · A few pilot holes don’t line up right (not needed though) Ugly: · Photocopied manual
customer_reviews.author: Jackey

customer_reviews.title: Best desk you can buy to improve your health
customer_reviews.text: Best desk you can buy to improve your health. Sit all day was taking its toll on our bodies. having the options to stand and work at a comfortable height is amazing. It get the blood flowing and better helps us concentrate on gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Balouga

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional. Everything about this desk is top quality. My favorite part is that the surface is coated with waterproof material so you don't get any O rings from cups and the like. Keep in mind the edge of the desk is tapered, though. You might have trouble clamping on mic mounts or Vesa mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley the Techie

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts AND broken
customer_reviews.text: Only the table top was delivered (the box says box 1 of 2 but the second box wasn’t there) and even that came broken. Complete waste of time, sending it back and will order a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: The Controller is not working. Parts are missing in ...
customer_reviews.text: The Controller is not working. Parts are missing in the package. It is a replacement unit after 3 previous units did not work. The supplier solution: return the unit to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LIBONE3

customer_reviews.title: NO SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT - THERE IS NO SUPPORT. Solidly built and has worked fine for 6 months. However, it no longer responds to the UP button. Unfortunately, no response from ApexDesk to emails and telephone calls. Last call, during what is stated as normal business hours, the voicemail message states "we are closed". I would give it a five star rating - if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Becky's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk!!!! Big and sturdy. I love the fact I can stand or sit for hours at the time. It is so much better to have a nice desk at home and not sitting in a cubical in an office.
customer_reviews.author: Still In Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The size, looks and performance are great. I really like the BT integration and beautiful construction.
customer_reviews.author: m@

customer_reviews.title: this is FANTASTIC. Solid
customer_reviews.text: this is FANTASTIC. Solid ,well designed fast & Free delivery....after a year of looking to upgrade my up/down desk...THIS IS THE WINNER
customer_reviews.author: Clarity143

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these now. All have arrived undamaged. Nice and sturdy. Look nice. I will buy more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment -- I looked at other similar tables ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the investment -- I looked at other similar tables but they don't have the large area this one offers. They also appear to have larger sizes but this fit my space perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: TXTRAVELER

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price! Awesome desk!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for more than a year now. This desk is really great! When the height of the right side became higher for some reason, I've just used the Apexdesk app to reset the height from the iPhone. Isn't it cool?
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: Love the desk
customer_reviews.text: Love the desk. Fairly easy to put together, a couple pre drilled holes were missing, but not a big deal. Top was a nice color with no damage. Would definately buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The desk base is solid but out the box the ...
customer_reviews.text: The desk base is solid but out the box the remote for up and down does not work. It takes 10 minutes just to get it all the way up and 10 to get it back down.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect! I work from my home office 8 hours a day. I love being able to simply go from sitting to standing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly positive
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong color table top but everything else is great with this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Great frame, now we have two
customer_reviews.text: I installed a butcher block on top of this frame. My wife likes it, it's been working flawlessly. I like it aswell, so I got one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mart

product_meta.title: ApexDesk Flex Pro 66" Series Tabletop Only, Mocha
product_meta.description:
Size:Top Only| Color:MochaThe ApexDesk Flex Pro Series Table Top is a great choice for DIY builders. Whether you are building a DIY Standing desk, or in need of a replacement top for your current Apex desk, this desk top covers a range of options. For DIY users, this table top fits desk frames between 45" ~ 68" wide. Just drill own holes to attach own desk frame. 

This tabletop has matching pre-installed anchors to go with the Flex Pro Series Standing Desks.

Overall Dimension: 1" x 66" x 30"
Item Weight: 53 Lbs
Material: Laminated PB. Meets CARB P2 Standards.
feature_bullets: 1” thick 66 x 30” textured wood-grain mocha top with scratch-resistant laminate and two 80mm cable grommets
Compatible pre-installed anchors for the Flex Pro Series Standing Desk Frames
Height adjustment range: 28" to 48.5" at 1" per second. Noise level less than 50 dB

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
